title: Am I in a low-priority queue
body: Of my last 15 games, I've queued up as mid primary, top secondary all 15 times. I have been placed top 12 of those 15 games (including my last game where I just went top Malzahar out of sheer frustration with having to play tops). This does not count 3+ other matches were someone dodged and I was also top. Can you tell me if I'm in some sort of low priority queue or is the position placement system just not doing a good job? Given that I've been in multiple sets of promos in the past 15 games this is really getting annoying.

replies.body: No LPQ on this account currently! It sounds like you've just been unlucky a few times with which role you got placed it.
